uninitMemberVar.description:
Description

Member variable 'classname::varname' is not initialized in the constructor. Member variables of native types, pointers, or references are left uninitialized when the class is instantiated. That may cause bugs or undefined behavior.
uninitMemberVar.option:
Static analysis does not have options.

Severity: warning
CWE: 398
Inconclusive: false
